me roginya karayan wallawaththa dehiwala kawudana rathmalana aadi pradeshawala menma nagenahira pradeshayeda bahula washayen sitina bawa aaranchiyi .dehiwala rathmalana aadi pradeshawala mun sinhalayan men hasirenawa muslim ganu muhuna wasanne menna me nithi wirodi ewunta me rate hawuharana denna .kadawalata badu ganna aawama mun katha karanne kadichchi ingirisiyen ehemath nathinam athin .esema mulu kolambaama maladiwayinkarayan gen ithiri pathiri gosin thibe .beth ganna kiya ena mun lankawe sthira padichiwi atha .mowuntame rate wahabi muslim prajawa upakara karanu labathi .eewagema muslim aagama igenimata kiya aprikanu ratawalin ,pakisthanayen ,indiyawen ,bangaladeshayen muslim tharunayan kolambaa thibena anthawadi aagam pasal walata pamine .mewa thahanam karanna aanduwak natha .
